participant_2.background:
I'm single, and I'm quite content with being on my own.
I sometimes burn myself while welding because I get too focused on the work and forget to take precautions.
I play the violin to help provide for my family.
I am a well-educated person who enjoys bowling and music.
i m pursuing my law degree.

content.text: I enjoy bowling and music, what do you enjoy?
I love to write and read, and I have two chihuahuas. What is your favorite thing to do?
I love to play the violin and weld! I also enjoy bowling and other competitive sports.
I've never tried welding, but I love to read. Do you play any other instruments?
I only play the violin, but I have always wanted to learn how to play the piano.
That's cool! I have always wanted to learn how to play the drums.
Maybe we can take a class together sometime!
That would be so much fun! I would love to learn a new instrument.
Me too! I think it would be a great way to spend time together and learn something new.
Yes, it would be a lot of fun to learn a new instrument and have some one to practice with.
I think we should definitely make plans to take a class together sometime!
